text: [Ej pajomʙar] Ust, ki kitoʙ [-i Qur'on]-ro ʙar tu nozil kard. Baxse az on ojoti muhkam [sarehu ravsan] ast, ki onho asosi kitoʙandu [ʙaxsi] digar mutasoʙehot ast [ki ta'vilpazirand]; ammo kasone, ki dar dilhojason inhirof ast, ʙaroi fitnacui [va gumroh kardani mardum] va ʙa xotiri ta'vili on [ʙa dilxohi xud], az mutasoʙehi on pajravi mekunand; hol on ki ta'vilasro [kase] cuz Alloh taolo namedonad; va rosixoni dar ilm [ulamoi din] megujand: "Mo ʙa hamai on [ojot, ci muhkamu ci mutasoʙeh] imon ovardem; hama az tarafi Parvardigori most"; va cuz xiradmandon kase pand namegirad
